description: Defines a utility class `ResponsiveBreakpoints` for determining device screen sizes and responsive behavior based on screen width thresholds. Includes constants for breakpoints and methods to check if the device is small, medium, or large, as well as a generic method to get value based on device size.

classes.name: ResponsiveBreakpoints
classes.description: A utility class providing static constants and methods to determine if the current device's screen size falls within small, medium, or large categories based on predefined width breakpoints, and to select values accordingly.

methods.name: isSmall
methods.description: Returns true if the device's screen width is less than the `smallMaxWidth` threshold.

methods.name: isMedium
methods.description: Returns true if the device's screen width is between `smallMaxWidth` and `mediumMaxWidth`.

methods.name: isLarge
methods.description: Returns true if the device's screen width is greater than or equal to `mediumMaxWidth`.

methods.name: value
methods.description: Returns a value of type T based on the device's size category (small, medium, large). Uses provided `small`, `medium`, and `large` values, with fallbacks.
